text: Tomara aro kichu loka abasya'i pabe yara tomadera sathe o tadera sampradayera sathe santi ca'ibe. Yakhana'i taderake phitâ€Œnara dike manonibesa karano haya takhana'i e byapare tara tadera agera abasthaya phire yaya. Yadi tara tomadera kacha theke cale na yaya, tomadera kache santi prastaba na kare ebam tadera hasta sambarana na kare tabe taderake yekhane'i pabe grephatara karabe o hatya karabe. Ara amara tomaderake edera birud'dhacaranera spasta adhikara diyechi
